welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marina, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and discover all that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monterey Peninsula Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Monterey Peninsula Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marina Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marina Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Watsonville Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Watsonville Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hollister Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hollister Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
